Html:
Hi,

I am running KiGG under VS2008. My problem is that I can't publish stories. I am able to submit a new story. I can see it under New and Upcoming Stories, but I don't know how to make it publishable or publish it.

I have also changed duration of "MinimumAgeOfStoryInHoursToPublish" and "MaximumAgeOfStoryInHoursToPublish" to 4 and 5.

Can any one explain how status changes works.


Thanks

Hi There,

 

On your admin panel, you will get a chance to publish the stories like "Publishable" and you click that link and boom you go. Sorry it might be too late for you. But someone might get benefited.

 

Cheers,

Narendra

Sharepoint News - A kigg based site for Microsoft sharepoint community
